ticket.title: test cases

version.title: test cases

version.body:
Hello Bismillah,
Unfortunately, this site is for bug issues for Ruby on Rails, so I am going to mark this ticket as invalid. Regarding your question, here is some sample code you may be able to use if you are using test unit in Rails:
http://snippets.dzone.com/posts/show/1170
If this isn't what you are looking for, i'd try asking on stackoverflow.com, railsforum.com or the Ruby on Rails forum here: http://www.ruby-forum.com/forum/3. Hope this helps.
Mike Riley twitter.com/wdperson
